title: You're nerfing Yasuo?????
body:
Good. 

I just wanna see how many people downvote before clicking on the post :^)

replies.body: "excellent" https://media.giphy.com/media/xT5LMDFVYplSVSyhva/giphy.gif
RIP me, I wanted to see who was hiding in the library
I'm downvoting because I'm edgy

Dear moderation: this is an example of a post with no content and spam, please remove upvote bait that contributes nothing meaningful to this board or admit to being complete hypocrites and terrible at your jobs.

Sincerely,

A concerned citizen
I like how you went from 5 upvotes to instant 0. rofl

> [{quoted}](name=HackRawESOMe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9bXlLiOz,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2016-09-08T02:13:33.908+0000)
>
> I like how you went from 5 upvotes to instant 0. rofl

I like how you pretending to be funny (this and the other comments you did), when you just post generic BS; But hey, people upvote you cause to get upvotes here you eitheir "be funny" or circlejerk.

Actually the dude is right, this is clickbait and don't belong to Gameplay. Attention bit.ch
you need to chill buddy

Nerfs in the next patch?

In 6.18 he barely got scratched other than the loss of his free auto attack. Yes, tank yasuo got a beating but "Slayer" yasuo will have even more attack speed now most of the time. The base increase makes his AS higher until level 6 and every AS item will scale better. With an AS+crit build, he will actually be stronger than before.
Tank Yasuo is his best build right now. If his best build got nerfed hard and a worse build got a neutral change/slight buff, that still counts as a nerf.

I don't see where he got hit "hard". Lowered his base AS, ult armor pen only applies to crit, which he still has plenty of, 60% crit only from PD. If he really wanted to, he could get 20% from runes, which would turn to 40% with his passive. Not a big nerf at all.
20 percent from runes?  Not a big nerf?  Losing out on standard ad marks,  armor or health seals,  and MR blues and your AD or LS quints is nothing?
>If he really wanted to.
No one is going to, so why even mention it.

>Not a big nerf? Losing out on standard ad marks, armor or health seals, and MR blues and your AD or LS quints is nothing?

You seemed like someone was going to actually take that rune page up there. So why even mention it?
downvoted.

downvoted.

This comment I mean.

downvoted.

His comment I mean.
guys stop downvoting this. When he says "his comment," I'm pretty sure he means the first one.

downvoted

Not continuing the trend.

voteddown

new trend
upvoted cause why not
I am confused
rightvoted.
You're? You're? You're? HOLY SHIT.

(directed to Riot) "You are nerfing Yasuo?"

makes sense to me.
I think the point was the person actually used correct grammar. Which is pure madness.

"nerf"....

patch notes for it should say: bruiser yasuo can't kill tanks quite so fast anymore. we buffed his early game a smidge so damage yasuo can get to 100% crit even faster.
^ This is the proper explanation...in a nutshell.
What buff? They didn't buff his kit.

How is his early game buffed? His AS cap on Q with PD and 29% AS runes got delayed from level 11 to level 13 with AS nerfs. His bug is gone, and he deals slightly less damage early on a normal build, and a lot less damage on the tank build.

: ^) 

You gotta put a space between the eyes and the nose.

:                                                                                       ---------------------------------- ^)                                                                                                                                                                                                            
More spaces means the more you want to kill yourself.

Edit: can't put spaces <:C.

He is not nerfed or at least wont hurt him. 
New frozen gives a bit of extra health aka. you now do this 
{{item:1055}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3022}} {{item:1018}} 2 more tank items of your choise sell dorans into ga.
Runes 29% attack speed scaling health yellow mr glyphs. And the build still fucks up everyone. And you don't have to complete the cloak early you only want the arpen vs tanky teams if the teams aint tanky you dont even get the cloak. i'm not a yasuo main i just casually pick him to counter teamcomps with high ranged skillshot champions because it allows me to kite and peel for my carries while dealing decent amount of dmg so before you get salty at my comment remember you are a scrub. ;p. So um yeah it doesnt take a yasuo genious to uderstand that he wont go below 50% win rate with that build as long as fervor remains as it is.
You do realize that infinity edge + shiv, boots and then tanky items on Yasuo is/was a thing, right? Some people still build him like this to this day.

and they are the ones in fail montages that showcase feed.lmao there is a reason most yasuo players go tanksuo it doesnt matter how much dmg you have unless you can deal it. And tank suo doesnt miss out on too much dmg he isnt gonna 3 hit you late game but he will 6 hit you and yu wont be able to get him off you
I think the title alone is already upvote-worthy.
AS growth and Ult nerf are not going to do anything. Fervor was the problem. Would still go this build {{item:3078}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3068}}

It absolutely fixes the problem.  The insane ar-pen is what makes his tank build so lethal, any bruiser with that build is going to be an issue for a squishy.  You can build those items on ANY champion and a squishy is going to need peel.  The problem is, he was a tank bruiser with 50% ar-pen without building an ar-pen item. Now it only effects crits, and a Yasuo building the way he SHOULD be, is going to have 100%  crit anyways so it doesn't effect Yasuo whatsoever, IF he's building the intended way.  This takes away and nerfs tank Yas.  I like it, very smart and decisive way to nerf something without effecting the other.  Honestly wish Riot were able to nerf aspects of champions in this precise of a way without effecting other play styles.  Sadly it has not been the case for most.
If I remember correctly it was bonus armor pen
*When you realize its mostly a nerf to the tank build*
because critsuo doesn't have no weaknesses like tanksuo?
mid lane and top lane will find peace now
You can think that
Longer Donger Yas
I was excited about it.

I dont feel like the nerf was enough.

Tank yasuo doesn't need ult to kill you.

And his slight attack speed reduction is meh.
